text: Tamen zhong you tingcong ni de, dan wo zai tamen de xin shang anle mo, yimian tamen lijie, bing zai tamen de er zhong zhizao long dun, jishi tamen kanjian suoyou jixiang, tamen ye bu hui xinyang, zhidao tamen lai yu ni bianlun shi, bu xinyang zhe cai shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan er yi.”
